full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDE MCHOG RTZA RGYUD LAS GSUNGS PA'I DAM TSIG BRGYAD KYI RNAM BZHAG BDE CHEN DPAL 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
